name: Hamsters in space
description:
"Hamsters in space" is a short comic I did during the Inktober event in 2019. It was primarily published in print, in Polish.

Now you all have a chance to read it either online or on your most favorite handheld, thanks to the brilliant - even if somewhat silly - idea of art cartridges. 

You can download the attached rom and put it on any kind of flash card or even flash it on an actual cartridge. If you do the latter - please, let me know. I'll send you box art.

You are not allowed to distribute this project commercially and it is anyway better to ask first before distributing it at all.
